sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"意图，企图"之意。
means: intention ： 普通用词，指某人内心产生的想做某事的想法，侧重内心活动。
intent ： 法律用词，常指某人怀有歹意而犯罪。
design ： 多用复数形式，含贬义多指行为不轨的意图。

sentence.Network_en: The president said he had no intention of deploying ground troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统称并不打算部署地面部队。

sentence.Network_en: Giovanni plied him with questions with the intention of prolonging his stay.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔瓦尼一个劲儿地问他问题，想要拖住他。

sentence.Network_en: Our intention was to demolish the rumours that have surrounded him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的目的是要彻底击破围绕他的那些谣言。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和功能作基本的区分：“意图“是从发.

英语单词后缀_百度知道 ... correction（ 修改）， intention（ 打算）， recognition（ 认识），.

list.abs: SAT词汇_百度文库 ... instinctive adj. 直觉的 intentional adj. 故意的 logical adj. 逻辑的.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intention tremor 意向性震颤 intentional 有意识的 intentional accident 意向性事故.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... intently 专心地 intentness 热心 intepreted languages 解释语言.
新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... inspirational a. 灵感的 intent a. 专心的，专注的 intricate a. 复杂精细的.
六级单词表精华版 - 豆丁网 ... intensify/ vt.vi. 加强，强化 intent/ a. 目不转睛的，热切的 interact/ vi. 相互作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French entencion, from Latin intentio(n-) 'stretching, purpose', from intendere (see intend)

entry.def: An intention is an idea or plan of what you are going to do.

example.ex: Beveridge announced his intention of standing for parliament...
example.tran: 贝弗里奇宣布他打算竞选议员。

example.ex: It is my intention to remain in my position until a successor is elected...
example.tran: 我的打算是继续呆在岗位上,直到选出继任者。

entry.tran: 不想/很想;不打算/一心打算
entry.def: If you say that you have no intention of doing something, you are emphasizing that you are not going to do it. If you say that you have every intention of doing something, you are emphasizing that you intend to do it.

example.ex: We have no intention of buying American jets...
example.tran: 我们无意购买美国喷气式飞机。

example.ex: Those close to him are convinced that he has every intention of staying on until the end of his seven-year term.
example.tran: 他身边的人都确信他打算继续留任，直到 7 年任期期满。

means.word_mean: 1. an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions;

sentences.sentence: "his intent was to provide a new translation"
"it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs"
"he made no secret of his designs"

means.word_mean: 2. (usually plural) the goal with respect to a marriage proposal;
3. an act of intending; a volition that you intend to carry out;

sentences.sentence: "my intention changed once I saw her"

auth_sentence.content: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.
auth_sentence.res_content: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.

auth_sentence.content: By now the original intention was hard to discern.
auth_sentence.res_content: By now the original intention was hard to discern.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By now the original intention was hard to discern.

auth_sentence.content: Iranian officials deny any intention to build nuclear weapons.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iranian officials deny any intention to build nuclear weapons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iranian officials deny any intention to build nuclear weapons.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

Sentence.sentence: Violation of a rule is misconduct even ifit is committed with good intentions?
it is committed with good intentions
He behaves in a way contrary to his real intention.

means.word_mean: 意图, 意向; 目的; 打算;计划

sentences.en: He is motivated by good intentions.
The intention of the clause is clear.
sentences.cn: 那条款的含义是清楚的。

sentences.en: I'm sorry I offended you, but it wasn't my intention.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 冒犯你了, 但我绝不是有意的。

jushi.english: Have you heard of her intention to resign?
jushi.chinese: 你听说过她打算辞职吗?

jushi.english: No amount of fine rhetoric can cover up his true intentions.
jushi.chinese: 不管说得多么好听,也掩盖不了他的真实意图。

jushi.english: He is motivated by good intentions.
